author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
In communist China, medical care is divided by power and privilege. Retired high-ranking officials enjoy exclusive access to top-tier doctors, free treatment, and elite hospitals—benefits paid for by taxpayers. Meanwhile, ordinary citizens struggle to afford basic care. Some are forced to choose between life and poverty. In one heartbreaking scene, a mother kneels beside her terminally ill daughter, apologizing for having no money left. The daughter replies, “Mom, let’s stop treatment. I’ll still be your daughter in the next life.” This is the cruel reality of healthcare under the CCP.

Watch as we expose the brutal inequality of China’s medical system and the human cost of a regime that values status over life.
title: Medical Privileges of the CCP Elite vs. Ordinary Citizens

author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
How did communist ideology infiltrate American education?
From Mao’s Cultural Revolution to woke classrooms, the same tactics—division, propaganda, and indoctrination—are being used to reshape young minds. This video exposes the origins of progressive education, the role of figures like Bill Ayers, and how atheism and evolutionism became dogma in U.S. schools.

Learn how the evil specter of communism quietly hijacked America’s classrooms—by targeting history, morality, and the parent-child bond.

🔔 Subscribe for more truth they don’t want you to hear.
📚 Based on How the Specter of Communism Is Ruling Our World.
title: The Red Infiltration of Education: How Communist Ideology Took Over America's Schools
